entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quick actions and refactoring - generate exception class creates obsolete code #72552
  • In the c# editor, improve automatic inclusion of "using" directives when copying code across files. #72551
  • Avoid unnecessary InvalidCastException for VB.NET #72547
  • Document outline : automatically collapse members and enums #72546
  • System.NullReferenceException should say which reference is null #72545
  • Cannot expand ref return properties in debugger. #72544
  • Fix all warning and errors set in Editorconfig does not do what it promises #72543
  • remove and sort usings should not touch globalusings #72542
  • NRE in ConversionsBase.ClassifyImplicitConversionFromType #72541
  • Two CodeRefactoringProviders failing with InvalidOperationException #72540
  • Class <>z__ReadOnlyArray<T> generated for literal collections is not tagged with CompilerGeneratedAttribute #72539
  • Iterative code fix application - for multi fix diagnostic #72535

Closed

  • Simple Elegant Way To Impliment IPropertyNotifyChanged On Auto Properties #72550
  • Case blocks to not be indented by default #72549
  • VisitObjectInitializerExpression throws InvalidCastException on invalid VisualBasic expression #72456

PullRequests

Created

  • Add explicit package reference to System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow #72554
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Handle InterceptsLocation with location specifier string #72553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • The RenameFlyout and DisposableToolTip do not use some color tokens correctly #72538
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Allow ref structs to implement interfaces, respect "allows ref struct" during constraints check. #72537
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Reduce allocations in NodeExtensions.LogTables #72536
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Expose semantic tokens functionality to Razor EA #72495
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix InvalidCastException when initializing the properties of an undeclared class inside a lambda function #72480
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Check PublishData.json feeds #72333
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in SynchronizeAssetsAsync #72533
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove ImmutableHashMap in favor of ImmutableDictionary #72520
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Always log LSP server processId and increase attach timeout #72531
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (follow-up) #72273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #72510
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Revert "Remove portions of solution crawler" #72527
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not return nonexistent kinds in `SyntaxFacts`' methods #72264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Convert Clasp into a source package #72237
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined operators #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Make sure to meld string or char constants in expression in interpolated string into adjacent literal & Use `String.Concat` if possible in interpolated string in VB #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • DefiniteAssignment: allow unconverted object creation expressions within bad expressions #72454
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce File I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder #72412
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not put an equals and quotes when completing an xml attribute if present #72508
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • [17.10] Bump roslyn-sdk and System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #72458
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow VS Code to provide razor source geneator references. #72482
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Implement SegmentedCollectionsMarshal #72395
    Area-IDE, untriaged
